mapper.sql: RESOURCEID, USERID, RESOURCESTATE, TITLE, SENDTIME, DEADLINE, RESOURCESCOPE, RESOURCEDATA
mapper.insert: insert into RESOURCES (RESOURCEID, USERID, RESOURCESTATE, TITLE, SENDTIME, DEADLINE, RESOURCESCOPE, RESOURCEDATA) values (#{resourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourcestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{resourcescope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourcedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

RESOURCEID,

mapper.update:
update RESOURCES
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCESTATE = #{resourcestate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SENDTIME = #{sendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEADLINE = #{deadline,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RESOURCESCOPE = #{resourcescope,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCEDATA = #{resourcedata,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RESOURCEID = #{resourceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
